Trial_Design.evidence: 208 patients were randomized in a 1:1 ratio

Participants.evidence: high-risk patients with heart failure and FMR

Intervention.evidence: M-TEER with MitraClip device or surgical mitral valve repair or replacement

Objective.evidence: The MATTERHORN trial aimed to compare the efficacy and safety outcomes

Method_Outcome.evidence: At 1 year, at least one primary endpoint event
